price: 64. Allah a maudit les mécréants et leur a préparé une Fournaise,
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ سَعِيرًا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha laʿana al-kāfirīna wa-aʿadda lahum saʿīran
